meanings.definition: The act of interpreting something incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: Her misinterpretation of the map led us in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent2: The misinterpretation of his words caused confusion among the students.
meanings.sent3: His misinterpretation of the joke made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The misinterpretation of the painting as a photograph amazed the art critics.
meanings.sent5: The misinterpretation of the instructions resulted in a failed experiment.

meanings.definition: A mistaken understanding or explanation of something.
meanings.sent1: The misinterpretation of the data led to incorrect conclusions.
meanings.sent2: His misinterpretation of the situation caused unnecessary worry.
meanings.sent3: The misinterpretation of the recipe made the dish taste strange.
meanings.sent4: Her misinterpretation of the novel's ending left her surprised.
meanings.sent5: The misinterpretation of the weather forecast resulted in unexpected rain showers.
